title: The shortcut switches in the notification panel are hidden
answer:
For EMUI 2.0, it is possible that you have configured the notification to not display shortcut switches. Please change the settings: go to Settings, select Notification panel and then select the Notification settings check box. 

 For EMUI 2.3 and above, the shortcut switches in the notification panel will be hidden after you enable ultra power saving mode. Please disable this mode by selecting Exit in the main screen of ultra power saving mode.
